data.text: Hi lekhabu hih Jisua Khrista chongphuong, Pathien'n a tîrlâmngei min riet ranga a pêk, neinun hong tung kelen rang thurchi hah ani. Khrista'n ma chong ngei hi a vântîrton juongtîrin a tîrlâm John kôm a juong min rieta,
male John'n a mu murdi ngei hah a misîra. Mahi Pathien chong le Jisua Khrista'n chongtak a phuonga a misîrna ani.
Hi lekhabua ânziek porepu ngei, le asûnga lei rilmasana chongngei rangâia male ajômpu ngei chu satvur an ni! Hi neinunngei murdi tungna rang zora hih anâi zoi sikin.
John renga Asia ramhuol sûnga koiindang sari ngei kôm:1:4: Jôk 3:14; Chph 4:5
male Jisua Khrista renga, rietpuipu taksônom, thina renga inthoi masatak le rammuol rêngngei roijêkpu khom ani sa.1:5: Isa 55:4; Lap 89:27
male a Pathien le a Pa sintho rangin a Rêngrama ochaingeiin mi sin zoi. Jisua Khrista kôm han roiinpuina le sinthotheina tuonsôt tuonsôtin om rese! Amen.1:6: Jôk 19:6; Chph 5:10

En roi, ama hih sûmngei lâia khin a juong rang ani! Mitinin mûng an tih, ama lei sunngei khom mu sa an tih. Pilchunga mi murdi'n ama châ an tih. Ma angtak han nîng atih!1:7: Dan 7:13; Mat 24:30; Mk 13:26; Luk 21:27; 1 Thes 4:17; Zak 12:10; Joh 19:34,37
“Keima hi amotontak le anûktak ki ni,” Pumapa Pathien Râtinchung, A om tit, A om sai le A la hong om rangpu han a ti.1:8: Chph 22:13; Jôk 3:14

Keima John, nin lâibungpa, le Jisua nûkjûipu a Rêngram mingei chunga dûktongna hong tung, diertaka tuongna tienga nin champuipa ki ni, Pathien chong le Jisua'n chongtak a phuong thurchi ki misîrna sikin Patmos tuihuola intângin ko oma.
Pumapa nikhuo han Ratha'n ku chunga sin a thoa, male ku nûktieng rôl inringtak, bekul inring angin ki rieta.

Ma anghin a tia, “Neinun nu mu ngei hi miziek roh, male ma lekhabu hi khopuilien sari ngei sûnga koiindang sari ngei kôm muthuon ngei roh: Ephesus, Smyrna, Pergamum, Thyatira, Sardis, Philadelphia le Laodicea.”
Tumo mi rokôk en rangin ko hônheia anîn chu, rângkachak châtidarnangei sari ku mua,
male ma châtidarnangei lâia han munisi aphuozek, a kephangei dênin kâncholiinchuol a haka, a rôpa rângkachak kongkhit a khit ku mua.1:13: Dan 7:13; 10:5
A sam chu belrimul, aninônchu rodokang dôra chek, male a mitngei chu meichuong angati;1:14-15: Dan 7:9; 10:6
a kephangei chu sum-eng meikhura hâlminvâr le nôtminvâr angin aoma, a rôl miring chu tuitâk rasa angin ani.1:15: Ezek 1:24; 43:2
A kut changtieng ârsi sari ngei a chôia, male a bâi renga khandai beniknei angaidak ahong suoka. A mâi chu sûnchimripa nisa râtlâitak angin ani.
Ama hah ku mu lehan, a kebula athi angin kên let raka. A kut changtieng ku chunga minngamin, “Chi no roh! Keima hih amotontak le anûktak ki ni, a tia.1:17: Isa 44:6; 48:12; Chph 2:8; 22:13
Keima hi aring hah ki ni! Ki thia, aniatachu atûn chu tuonsôta rangin ki ring nôk zoi ani. Thina chunga le mithi khuo chunga khom rachamneina ko dôn ani.
Hanchu, neinun nu mu ngei, atûna aom ngei le nûkka ahong om rang ngei hih miziek roh.

Ma hih ku kut changtienga ârsi sari nu mu ngei, le rângkachak châtidarna sari ngei omtie inthup chu an ni: ârsi sari ngei chu koiindang sari ngeia vântîrtonngei an nia, male châtidarna sari ngei chu koiindang sari ngei hah an ni.”
